The four most common tags used in Named Entity Recognition (NER) are PER (Person), LOC (Location), ORG (Organization), and GPE (Geo-Political Entity). They represent proper names that can refer to a person, location, organization, or geo-political entity.

What does the 'B' tag represent in BIO Tagging?
